baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，共一蓐，同一被臥，除餘時，波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 91

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼共白衣及外道婦女同衣臥。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 149

partialParallels.text: 若二比丘尼共一敷具臥。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 88

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭeyyuṁ, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 32

translations.text: Welche Nonnen sich aber zu zweit eine Decke und einen Umhang teilen, müssen dafür sühnen.
Should two bhikkhunis share a single blanket or sleeping mat, it is to be confessed.
Jika dua orang Bhikkhuni berbagi sebuah selimut atau tikar untuk tidur, itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼。同敷床褥臥波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 114

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼與比丘尼式叉摩那沙彌尼同衣臥。波逸提(一百五十)。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 150

partialParallels.text: 若二比丘尼共一衣覆臥。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 89
